title: Investigate Team for Misconduct
description: A team is accused of violating league rules by holding unauthorized practice sessions. The league must investigate.

tasks.description: Gather any evidence related to the accusation, such as witness statements or social media posts.
Formally request a statement from the accused team's management.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal request for information to the team.

tasks.description: Review the evidence and the team's statement to determine if a violation occurred.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent concludes that the team did violate the rules.

tasks.description: Issue a penalty, such as a fine or a loss of draft picks, to the team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent issues a fine to the team for the violation.
